bugs.title: Login button not responsive
bugs.description: When clicking the login button, nothing happens. The form does not submit and no error message is displayed. This occurs on Chrome and Firefox browsers. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open login page, 2. Enter valid credentials, 3. Click login button, 4. Observe no response.

bugs.title: Application crashes on startup
bugs.description: The application terminates unexpectedly immediately after launch with error code 0x80004005. This happens consistently on Windows 10 machines. Stack trace shows memory access violation in the main thread initialization.

bugs.title: Search functionality returns empty results
bugs.description: The search feature returns no results even when searching for terms that should match existing data. Database connection appears normal. Issue affects all users across different browsers.

bugs.title: User registration form validation error
bugs.description: Email validation incorrectly rejects valid email addresses containing plus signs or dots before the @ symbol. For example, test.user+tag@example.com is rejected as invalid.

bugs.title: Password reset email not delivered
bugs.description: Password reset emails are not being sent to users. SMTP server configuration appears correct and test emails work. Only affects password reset functionality specifically.

bugs.title: Dashboard loads slowly on mobile devices
bugs.description: The main dashboard takes 10-15 seconds to load on mobile devices, compared to 2-3 seconds on desktop. Network analysis shows excessive API calls and large asset downloads.

bugs.title: File upload fails for large files
bugs.description: File uploads fail for files larger than 50MB with a timeout error. Server logs show request timeout after 30 seconds. Smaller files upload successfully without issues.

bugs.title: Database connection timeout during peak hours
bugs.description: Users experience database connection timeouts during peak usage hours (9-11 AM and 2-4 PM). Connection pool may be insufficient for concurrent load.

bugs.title: Login form accepts empty credentials
bugs.description: The login form allows submission with empty username and password fields. Should display validation error instead of attempting authentication with empty values.

bugs.title: Memory leak in background service
bugs.description: Background worker process shows steadily increasing memory usage over time, reaching 2GB+ after 24 hours of operation. Requires daily service restart to prevent system instability.

bugs.title: Navigation menu disappears on mobile
bugs.description: The main navigation menu is not visible on mobile devices in portrait mode. Menu appears correctly in landscape mode and on tablets. CSS media query issue suspected.

bugs.title: API returns incorrect status codes
bugs.description: REST API endpoints return HTTP 200 status for error conditions instead of appropriate error codes like 404 or 500. Makes error handling difficult for client applications.

bugs.title: Session expires too quickly
bugs.description: User sessions expire after only 15 minutes of inactivity, forcing frequent re-authentication. Users report this interrupts their workflow and reduces productivity.

bugs.title: Report generation fails with special characters
bugs.description: PDF report generation fails when data contains special characters like accented letters or symbols. Process terminates with encoding error in the report engine.

bugs.title: Search results pagination broken
bugs.description: Pagination controls in search results do not work correctly. Clicking 'Next' or page numbers shows the same first page results instead of subsequent pages.

bugs.title: User profile image upload corrupted
bugs.description: Uploaded profile images appear corrupted or distorted after processing. Issue affects JPEG files specifically. PNG files upload and display correctly.

bugs.title: Email notifications sent to wrong addresses
bugs.description: System notifications are being sent to incorrect email addresses. Appears to be using outdated email addresses from user profiles rather than current ones.

bugs.title: Date picker shows wrong year range
bugs.description: Date picker component displays years from 1900-2020, missing current and future years. Users cannot select dates after December 31, 2020 in forms.

bugs.title: Export functionality generates empty files
bugs.description: Data export feature creates CSV files with headers only, no data rows. Database queries return correct data when tested manually. Export worked correctly until recent update.

bugs.title: Password complexity validation too strict
bugs.description: Password validation requires special characters that are not clearly specified, causing user frustration. Error message is vague: 'Password does not meet complexity requirements'.

bugs.title: Chart rendering fails in Internet Explorer
bugs.description: Data visualization charts do not render in Internet Explorer 11. Charts display correctly in modern browsers. Console shows JavaScript compatibility errors.

bugs.title: Form autosave conflicts with manual save
bugs.description: Automatic form saving conflicts with manual save operations, sometimes overwriting user changes. Users report losing work when both systems attempt to save simultaneously.

bugs.title: Print function cuts off page content
bugs.description: Print preview and actual printing cuts off content that extends beyond single page width. Content should wrap or scale to fit printer page dimensions.

bugs.title: Multi-file upload progress incorrect
bugs.description: When uploading multiple files simultaneously, the progress bar shows incorrect completion percentage. Individual file progress is accurate, but overall progress is wrong.

bugs.title: Login button unresponsive after failed attempt
bugs.description: After entering incorrect credentials, the login button becomes unclickable until page refresh. Form validation shows error message but button remains disabled incorrectly.
